Subject: Snoozed Queue+wakeup time...
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=208281025
X-Yahoo-Profile: spielc

Hi everybody!

I've got another question (i know... again ;)):

If i understood it correctly everytime a exception
during the crawl is thrown, the crawler waits for a
given time before he continues the crawl. The problem
is that it waits for about 15 minutes or something
like it, that's ways to long in my eyes... Now my
question is, where the setting for the duration of the
timeout can be found and (hopefully) changed (if there
is a setting for it at all...)
